## Here's a list of some useful resources

-   For PhD candidates, the [UTAS intranet page](https://universitytasmania.sharepoint.com/sites/research-division/SitePages/HDR-Candidates.aspx) for graduate research is a great page to find resources and support services available

-   The [IMAS intranet page](https://universitytasmania.sharepoint.com/sites/imas/) is a great resource to find all things IMAS-related

-   [Field friendly](https://utas.fieldfriendly.com/) is IMAS' preferred project management and approval system.
    All staff and students use field friendly to gain access to buildings, laboratories and project management, including fieldwork approval.
